page.title: 03COLLEGE,SPARSHOLT.
page.content: My name is Claire Morgan,I live at the College of Agriculture.My Dad is the foreman of the horticultural department.Our house comes with Dad's job and is one of the oldest houses at the College. We have an Open Day at the College each year(in June),there are lots of different things to see like sheep shearing, sheepdog trials,tractor rides,watching the cows being milked and rural crafts. About a week before the Open Day I help Dad get ready.I weed around the bog garden and the O-field (the O-field is a piece of grassland shaped in an O which has two lakes and various plants and shrubs in).Then we do some watering in the greenhouses.We get the tomatoes,cucumbers and flowers ready for selling on Open Day.
